body:
CONFIG_USER_NS=y
I tried:
setenforce 0
getenforce
Permissive

tests still failed as before.

I set SELINUX to disabled and rebooted.
getenforce
Disabled

tests still failed as before.

I also tried a fedora21 ppc64le system and that passes with selinux enabled.  Only RHEL 7.2 fails.
